Container.Name: Scan2Target
Container.Overview:
Modern web-based scan server for network and USB scanners. Control scanners remotely and route documents to SMB shares, email, cloud storage, or webhooks.
Features: - Auto-Discovery for USB and network scanners (SANE/eSCL) - 9 Target Types: SMB, SFTP, Email, Paperless-ngx, Webhooks, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Nextcloud - Multi-Language support (English/German) - Statistics dashboard with comprehensive analytics - Secure encrypted credentials (Fernet AES-128) - Auto-Retry for failed uploads - PWA support - Install as native app - Real-Time WebSocket updates
Default Login: admin / admin (change immediately!)
IMPORTANT: Host network mode is required for scanner discovery (mDNS/Avahi)

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: Persistent storage for database and scans

Config.Name: SCAN2TARGET_SECRET_KEY
Config.Description: Encryption key for credentials (generate with: openssl rand -base64 32)
